title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Germany Demands Action Against Distortion of Holocaust History via AI Images
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Artificial intelligence seen as a force multiplier for research, discovery
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence is no longer just a peripheral tool in research. The rapid accumulation, availability and accessibility of data sets has now become a structural layer of the scientific method itself. Across materials science, drug development, biology, economics, education, and business, AI systems are now generating hypotheses, designing experiments, synthesizing data, and even executing laboratory workflows. The result is not just faster science, but a fundamental shift in how knowledge is created.

title: Search is on for PH first AI Olympiad team
description: A nationwide search has begun for Filipino high school students who will form the country’s first national team for the International Olympiad in Artificial Intelligence, a global academic competition focused on both the creation and responsible application of artificial intelligence.

title: India-Japan Partnership Can Strongly De-Risk Global Economy: Jaishankar
description: A meeting between Jaishankar and his Japanese counterpart Toshimitsu Motegi saw both sides agreeing to set up a joint working group on critical minerals and a dialogue mechanism on artificial intelligence. The Japanese foreign minister met Prime Minister Narendra Modi ahead of his talks with Jaishankar.
